p: What will happen after April 21, 2021? Despite the on-going controversies, great progress has been made toward the development of a modern animal health system based on scientific knowledge and epidemiology thanks largely to the work and the mediation of various groups in the commission and an incredible effort of sharing, coordinated by the commission among the 28 MS. The Italian Department of Health, a pioneer in “One Health” responsible for both human and animal health, fully supports implementation of AHL in developing a new culture of disease prevention in Europe.
